block.mini_tardis.interior_door.tooltip: The entrance and exit of your Tardis.
block.mini_tardis.handbrake.tooltip: Triggers both takeoff and landing sequences.
block.mini_tardis.console_screen.tooltip: Displays critical information about your Tardis
block.mini_tardis.wall_screen.tooltip: Displays critical information about your Tardis
block.mini_tardis.reset_destination_butt: Sets your destination back to your current location.
block.mini_tardis.nudge_destination_butt: Used to offset your target destination in a specific direction.
Used to offset your target destination in a specific direction. Alternative color.
block.mini_tardis.coordinate_scale_selec: Configures the coordinate scale used by Target Localization Correctors.
block.mini_tardis.rotation_selector.tool: Used to change the destination facing of your Tardis.
block.mini_tardis.state_comparator.toolt: Used in conjunction with another control to modify its behaviour.
block.mini_tardis.vertical_nudge_destina: Used to move your destination on the Y axis.
block.mini_tardis.fuel_control.tooltip: Unlocks artron conduits, a prerequisite for flight.
block.mini_tardis.coordinate_lock.toolti: Used to lock your current target destination.
block.mini_tardis.interior_light.tooltip: Turns on and emits a redstone signal based on your Tardis' state.
block.mini_tardis.power_coupling.tooltip: Can be used to completely turn off your Tardis.
block.mini_tardis.makeshift_engine.toolt: Can be used to build a makeshift Tardis, letting you temporarily enter the time vortex.
